mapper.sql: id, supplier_name, subject_name, `level`, supplier_type, create_id, update_id, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert:
insert into t_supplier (supplier_name, subject_name, `level`, supplier_type, create_id, update_id, create_time, update_time) values
(#{item.supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.subjectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.supplierType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT})
